submodules.WordPress overview: Learn about WordPress and its community.
submodules.Where to start?: Are you new to WordPress? Learn how to get started now.
submodules.FAQs: A list of common WordPress questions from the community.
submodules.About WordPress: Learn more about the WordPress project and its history.
submodules.Technical guides: Learn how to install WordPress and keep it secure and healthy.
submodules.Installation: Need a hand installing WordPress? This section will help you.
submodules.Maintenance: Keep your site updated and ready with the articles in this section.
submodules.Security: Everything you need to know to protect your site, from password best practices to privacy.
submodules.Support guides: Get to know how to publish with WordPress.
submodules.Dashboard: Get to know the control center of your site.
submodules.Publishing: Learn how to create and publish your content.
submodules.Media: Learn how to manage your media files.
submodules.Customization: Get the look and feel you want on your site.
submodules.Appearance: Learn how to give the look and feel you want to your site.
submodules.Default themes: Get information on the default themes that ship with WordPress.
submodules.Media Blocks: Learn about the Audio, Cover, File, Gallery, Image, Media & Text, and the Video blocks.
submodules.Text Blocks: Learn about the basic text blocks that make up the main content of your website.
submodules.Design Blocks: Learn about the various layout blocks, including Group, Row, Stack, Buttons, Columns, and more.
submodules.Embed Blocks: Learn about all the included embed blocks, and how to configure them.
submodules.Widget Blocks: Learn about Archives, Calendar, and the other blocks that are available to use as widgets.
submodules.Theme Blocks: Learn about how to apply theme-specific blocks for your block themes and custom templates.
submodules.Get more help: Support forums Ask questions in the support forums. Developers Check out the developer documentation. Content suggestions Report an error or change in the documentation issue tracker. Get involved Learn about the Documentation Team and how to contribute.
